sentence: The Steelers’ biggest assets are a few superstar performers on defense: edge rusher T.J. Watt, defensive end Cameron Heyward and safety Minkah Fitzpatrick.

title: Mark Madden: Steelers are underinvested at 3 most important positions

sentence: • Rudolph 11/4 • Derek Carr (Las Vegas) 7/1 • Jimmy Garoppolo (San Francisco) 15/2 • Jameis Winston (New Orleans) 9/1 • Kenny Pickett (Pitt) 9/1 • Haskins 10/1 A pair of other veterans, Kirk Cousins and Ryan Fitzpatrick, are next at 11/1.

title: Dolphins Q&A: Could AFC’s young guns at quarterback change team’s commitment to Tua?

sentence: Here's a look at some of the available signal-callers: Free Agency: Cam Newton, Ryan Fitzpatrick, Andy Dalton, Jameis Winston, Teddy Bridgewater, Marcus Mariota, Mitchell Trubisky, Tyrod Taylor 2022 NFL Draft: Kenny Pickett (Pittsburgh), Matt Corral (Ole Miss), Malik Willis (Liberty), Desmond Ridder (Cincinnati), Sam Howell (UNC) Given those options, it's fair to wonder whether the Steelers could become heavily involved in the Aaron Rodgers sweepstakes if he's traded or released by the Green Bay Packers.
author: Tim Daniels
title: Steelers' Top QB Options in 2022 Free Agency, NFL Draft as Ben Roethlisberger Retires

sentence: In fact, the next oldest active quarterbacks after the 44-year-old Brady is 39-year-old Ryan Fitzpatrick and 38-year-old Aaron Rodgers.

title: Tom Brady’s Witty Response to Ben Roethlisberger’s Retirement

sentence: There's likely to be at least one team that talks itself into taking a signal-caller in the top 10, but it would be surprising to see any of them be a huge upgrade over Taylor Heinicke or Ryan Fitzpatrick in Year 1.
